statements: SELECT video_id, revenue FROM ad_revenue
SELECT ad_type, timestamp FROM ad_revenue
SELECT * FROM ad_revenue WHERE revenue > 1000
SELECT video_id, ad_type, timestamp FROM ad_revenue ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT ad_type, SUM(revenue) as total_revenue FROM ad_revenue GROUP BY ad_type HAVING total_revenue > 5000
SELECT video_id, revenue FROM ad_revenue WHERE ad_type = 'banner' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT timestamp, ad_duration FROM ad_revenue WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue ASC
SELECT * FROM ad_revenue WHERE revenue < 500 AND ad_type = 'video' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT video_id, revenue, ad_type, ad_duration, timestamp FROM ad_revenue WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT DISTINCT ad_type FROM ad_revenue ORDER BY ad_type ASC
SELECT video_id, video_title, ad_revenue FROM video_content;
SELECT ad_id, ad_clicks, ad_revenue FROM ad_metrics;
SELECT video_id, video_title FROM video_content WHERE ad_revenue > 100;
SELECT ad_id, ad_clicks FROM ad_metrics WHERE ad_clicks < 10;
SELECT video_title, ad_revenue FROM video_content ORDER BY ad_revenue DESC;
SELECT video_title, ad_revenue FROM video_content ORDER BY ad_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM video_content WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT video_title, ad_revenue, ad_clicks FROM video_content LEFT JOIN ad_metrics ON video_content.video_id = ad_metrics.video_id WHERE ad_revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ad_metrics WHERE ad_revenue > 500 AND ad_clicks >= 100 ORDER BY ad_revenue DESC, ad_clicks DESC;
SELECT AVG(ad_revenue) AS average_revenue FROM ad_metrics GROUP BY video_id ORDER BY average_revenue DESC;
SELECT video_id, video_title, views, revenue FROM video_content WHERE views > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, ads_served, cost FROM ad_campaign WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY ads_served ASC;
SELECT report_id, date, total_revenue FROM revenue_report WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT video_id, video_title, views, revenue FROM video_content WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY video_id;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, ads_served, cost FROM ad_campaign WHERE ads_served > 500 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM video_content WHERE views > 1000 ORDER BY video_title ASC;
SELECT video_title, revenue FROM video_content WHERE revenue > 5000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, cost FROM ad_campaign WHERE ads_served > 500 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM revenue_report WHERE total_revenue < 10000 ORDER BY total_revenue ASC, date DESC;
SELECT video_title, views, revenue FROM video_content JOIN ad_campaign ON video_content.video_id = ad_campaign.campaign_id WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT * FROM Videos;
SELECT title, views FROM Videos ORDER BY views DESC;
SELECT ad_name, cost_per_click FROM Advertisements WHERE cost_per_click > 0.50;
SELECT video_id, title FROM Videos WHERE duration > '00:05:00';
SELECT username, email FROM Users ORDER BY registration_date;
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE views > 1000;
SELECT video_id, title FROM Videos WHERE duration > '00:30:00';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, cost_per_click FROM Advertisements WHERE cost_per_click < 0.5;
SELECT revenue_id, revenue_amount, date FROM Revenue WHERE revenue_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM Users WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT video_title, release_date FROM video_content WHERE views_count > 1000 ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT video_title, views_count, ad_revenue FROM video_content WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' AND release_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaign WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY total_budget DESC, campaign_name ASC;
SELECT ad_id, video_id, start_time, end_time FROM ad_placement WHERE video_id = 101 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM ad_revenue WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM video_content WHERE views_count > 10000 ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT video_title, views_count, release_date FROM video_content WHERE ad_revenue > 1000 ORDER BY video_title ASC;
SELECT vc.video_title, ar.revenue_amount FROM video_content AS vc JOIN ad_revenue AS ar ON vc.video_id = ar.ad_id WHERE vc.release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT ac.campaign_name, ac.total_budget, ap.start_time, ap.end_time FROM ad_campaign AS ac JOIN ad_placement AS ap ON ac.campaign_id = ap.ad_id WHERE ac.status = 'active';

SELECT ap.placement_id, vc.video_title, ac.campaign_name, ac.total_budget, ar.revenue_amount FROM ad_placement AS ap JOIN video_content AS vc ON ap.video_id = vc.video_id JOIN ad_campaign AS ac ON ap.ad_id = ac.campaign_id JOIN ad_revenue AS ar ON ap.ad_id = ar.ad_id;
